alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Malibu Coast; Palos Verdes Hills; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 12 at 3:59AM PDT until July 12 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast, Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast, Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Malibu Coast, Los Angeles County Beaches, Palos Verdes Hills and Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
